categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starfighter classes

nodes.text: The CIS-Advanced starfighter was designed by the Confederacy of Independent Systems, during the Clone Wars. The prototype never saw any action except for a few trials.
It was constructed in a CIS Weapons Factory on the planet Diado. On a mission, Saesee Tiin stole the starfighter and destroyed the factory completely, obliterating all plans of the starfighter.
